EmailTemplate.description: to people who filled out Benchmark teaser form
EmailTemplate.name: Global_Website_Benchmark_Early Access.Notification - full survey is live
EmailTemplate.subject: Learn how to innovate in a software-driven world
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://benchmark.builttoadapt.io/overall]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
The Built to Adapt Benchmark is now live. The Benchmark assessed more than 1,600 respondents from the world's top organizations to explore how they align their product development and IT operations with business goals to build software that delivers desirable outcomes.
Take the questionnaire to see how your results compare. View the Benchmark <[[https://benchmark.builttoadapt.io/overall]]> Regards,
The Pivotal Team
